caption: The girl quickly finishes her soup and uses hand gestures to communicate with the boy. He responds in the same way, and they both signal the waiter to bring the bill. The waiter comes over, and they pay him. The girl has a bunch of coins. They walk along the streets at night, stop, and continue gesturing and communicating. The girl hops on an electric scooter and speeds away. Downstairs, there's a fire truck and an ambulance. Firefighters are carrying a stretcher with a woman on it. Another girl rushes into the hospital room to visit the woman. They communicate with each other and then share a heartfelt hug. One woman takes a shower and then starts doing household chores.
